Title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Erica Rivinoja (screenplay by), John Francis Daley (screenplay), Jonathan Goldstein (screenplay by), Phil Lord (story by), Christopher Miller (story by), Erica Rivinoja (story by), Judi Barrett (inspired by the book "Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs" written by), Ron Barrett (inspired by the book "Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs" illustrated by)
Actors: Bill Hader, Anna Faris, James Caan, Will Forte
Plot: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.
